about.intro: Amazonia at the crossroads is an overview of the status of pressures and threats in the Protected Natural Areas and Indigenous Territories of six countries of the Amazonia. The analysis and the examples presented are based on cartographic data of the publication {link}
text.link: Pressures on and Threats to Protected Areas and Indigenous Territories in Amazonia 2018
about.intro2: Data can be downloaded from the site of {link2}
about.intro3: This digital report published on 5 June 2019 was prepared under a partnership between:
about.license: Copyright. To reproduce text, image and data content, please contact {RAISG} and {INFO}
about.title: About
general.tagline: Recent analysis from six countries show the conflict between the vision of economic development and the rights of indigenous territories and conservation of protected areas
head.description: Recent analysis from six countries show the conflict between the vision of economic development and the rights of indigenous territories and conservation of protected areas
head.title: Amazonia at the crossroads
